subject: Hello this is mr charles Bra
body:
Hello this is mr charles Brayan the general manager of all international
airports
This is is to bring to you notice that Mr Jerry Came to our office
last time to pay $550 dollar for the delivery of your fund.
In order to claim your consignment box of 200 million USD Stating it
clear that you have died few months ago and he is the right one to
replaced you and have your consignment box of $200 million dollars
So if it's not true then send your home address immediately Because if
we didn't see your reply in hours, That means his claim will be
granted.
Kindly send the below information to enable us to set the account open for
you.
Full Name:..................
Full Address:.........................
Direct Cellphone Number:..........
PASSPORT AND ID CARDS:.................
YOUR OCCUPATION.........
POSITION.........
DATE OF BIRTH..............
Looking forward to your next letter

subject: Re:   Hello this is mr charles Bra
body:
Hello Mr. Charles Brayan,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm surprised to hear about this situation, especially the part about me being dead! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well.

I'm curious, how did Mr. Jerry prove his claim? Did he provide any documents or evidence? Also, could you please clarify what you mean by "pay dollar for the delivery of your fund"? 

As for my home address, I would prefer not to share it at this time due to privacy concerns. However, I am more than willing to continue our conversation and find a solution to this issue.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
Heather

subject: Re:   Hello this is mr charles Bra
body:
Your email is well received and appreciated I want you to know that you will received your funds immediately after you pay the needed fee of $550 apple gift card


Sent from Outlook<http://aka.ms/weboutlook>

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Heather
